com.github.kvnxiao.kommandant.command

Interface CommandAnn


  • public CommandAnn

    An annotation class that should be used by classes implementing interface ICommandParser (e.g. class CommandParser), which will process classes for methods annotated with this annotation and create new commands from them.

    The annotation should target methods with the same signature as interface ICommandExecutable to define commands and their properties.

    See Also:
    interface ICommandParser, class CommandParser, interface ICommandExecutable

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String[] aliases()
      Defines the aliases for the command represented in an array of strings.
      java.lang.String description()
      Defines the description of the command.
      boolean execWithSubcommands()
      Defines whether the command should execute alongside its subcommand or be skipped when subcommands are processed.
      boolean isDisabled()
      Defines whether the command is disabled.
      java.lang.String parentName()
      Defines the unique name of the parent command which implies that this command will be a subcommand of that parent.
      java.lang.String prefix()
      Defines the prefix of the command.
      java.lang.String uniqueName()
      Defines the unique name identifier of the command.
      java.lang.String usage()
      Defines the usage of the command.

    • Method Detail

      • prefix

        java.lang.String prefix()

        Defines the prefix of the command.

        Defaults toCommandDefaults.PREFIX.

      • uniqueName

        java.lang.String uniqueName()

        Defines the unique name identifier of the command.

        This field is always required.

      • aliases

        java.lang.String[] aliases()

        Defines the aliases for the command represented in an array of strings.

        This field is always required.

      • description

        java.lang.String description()

        Defines the description of the command.

        Defaults toCommandDefaults.NO_DESCRIPTION.

      • usage

        java.lang.String usage()

        Defines the usage of the command.

        Defaults toCommandDefaults.NO_USAGE.

      • parentName

        java.lang.String parentName()

        Defines the unique name of the parent command which implies that this command will be a subcommand of that parent.

        This is used to link subcommands to their parent commands.Defaults toCommandDefaults.PARENTas an empty string representing no parent command.

      • execWithSubcommands

        boolean execWithSubcommands()

        Defines whether the command should execute alongside its subcommand or be skipped when subcommands are processed.

        Defaults toCommandDefaults.EXEC_WITH_SUBCOMMANDS.

      • isDisabled

        boolean isDisabled()

        Defines whether the command is disabled.

        Defaults toCommandDefaults.IS_DISABLED.
